attributes.action: I petition the Prime Minister NOT to increase Air Passenger Duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasing air passenger duty will deter people from travelling abroad.  That's unfair to those who wish to take a well earned holiday with their folks and it's detrimental to an already ailing air travel industry which supports thousands of workers livelihoods.  PLEASE, don't do it.  Postpone the increase until the financial crisis has lifted.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister not to increase Air Passenger Duty.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=AirPassgrDuty


Her Majesty's Government
